attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
l wish the media and schools to stop  calling children kids and let go back to calling them children,
l would like to see the word kids removed as a form of calling  our children.
let get  this put  forward as a move maybe to a way of making children more  of a family member rather then a term used for  baby goats.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
